name: Kibo's Journey Home
description:
This is an entry for Riggy2k3's "DEPENDABLE FRIEND" game jam and was made in less than a week.

Kibo is on his way home, where he meets a bunch of stray cats on their mission to kill a giant monster. Meanwhile Kibo's dog Aiko is patiently waiting for his snacks. Hijinks ensue.

This game includes:
- 7 party members
- 7 stages
- a bunch of spelling mistakes
- uhhhh...

Thank you for playing this absolute waste of time!  c:
